definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItem" id="item">item</variable><variable type="Number" id="x_block">x_block</variable><variable type="Number" id="y_block">y_block</variable><variable type="Number" id="z_block">z_block</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="world_switch_world"><field name="dimension">Surface</field><statement name="worldstatements"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="1"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="gui_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:item</field><value name="VAL"><block type="gui_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:x_block</field><value name="VAL"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">x</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:y_block</field><value name="VAL"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">y</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:z_block</field><value name="VAL"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">z</field></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">if (!item.isEmpty() && world instanceof Level level) {&#10;    // Удаляем старые сущности отображения внутри блока&#10;    AABB box = new AABB(x_block, y_block + 0.6, z_block, x_block + 1, y_block + 0.8, z_block + 1);&#10;    List<Entity> foundEntities = level.getEntities(null, box);&#10;    for (Entity e : foundEntities) {&#10;        if (e.getType() == EntityType.ITEM_DISPLAY && "shop_display".equals(e.getName().getString())) {&#10;            e.discard();&#10;        }&#10;    }&#10;&#10;    // Создаём копию предмета, только один экземпляр&#10;    ItemStack singleItem = item.copy();&#10;    singleItem.setCount(1);&#10;&#10;    // Создаём ItemDisplay&#10;    ItemDisplay display = new ItemDisplay(EntityType.ITEM_DISPLAY, level);&#10;    display.setItemStack(singleItem);&#10;    display.setPos(x_block + 0.5, y_block + 0.67, z_block + 0.5); // слегка утоплен вниз&#10;    display.setBillboardConstraints(Display.BillboardConstraints.FIXED); // не поворачивается к игроку&#10;    display.setCustomName(Component.literal("shop_display"));&#10;    display.setCustomNameVisible(false);&#10;&#10;    // Добавляем в мир&#10;    level.addFreshEntity(display);&#10;}&#10;</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
